title: Halo 3
rules: No coaching or excessive commentating during the match. You may be asked to leave if you violate this rule.
Participants are encouraged to bring a copy of the game, we have stations but few games.
Each player must bring his or her own unmodified controller.

tourney.title: 2v2
rules: Swiss style given enough stations.  Limited number will be single elimination.
Bracket stage games are best of 3. Finals are best of 5.
At the start of each round, both teams will come together and choose a map and gametype for the game, repeat for all games in the match.
Sequential games in a match may not repeat gametypes nor maps.
No two games in a match will have the same map and gametype.

tourney.title: 4v4
rules: Swiss style given enough stations.  Limited number will be single elimination.
Bracket stage games are best of 3. Finals are best of 5.
At the start of each round, both teams will come together and choose a map and gametype for the game, repeat for all games in the match.
Sequential games in a match may not repeat gametypes nor maps.
No two games in a match will have the same map and gametype.
